name: European Forum for Manufacturing
memberOrga: ABB,AFME, General Electric, Caterpillar, CECE - European Construction Equipment Industry, CECIMO -  European Association of the Machine Tool Industries, CEEMET -  Council of European Employers of the Metal, Engineering and Technology-based Industries, CECED, CEFIC -  European Chemical Industry Council, EEF - The Manufacturers' Organisation, Orgalime -  European Engineering Industries Association, Siemens, VDMA - The German Engineering Federation, United Technologies, Volvo, ZVEI - German Electrical and Electronic Association
goal: The EFM aims to contribute to the development of  European public  policies addressing the economic, employment and environmental challenges facing technology and manufacturing globally.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
